DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors Promoting Coronary Plaque Progression In China
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY DESIGN This national multicenter retrospective study . Through review angiography database 20 CHD intervention center China . We collect data 2400 patient twice coronary angiography well 12-24 month interval Jun 2013 Dec 2016 . We confirm actual rate coronary plauqe progression CHD patient China well regression analysis investigate impact different risk factor progression coronary plaque , thus find primary risk factor rational strategy secondary prevention . In study , include patient replace withdrawal . STUDY POPULATION 2,400 patient diagnosed CHD receive 2 time coronary angiography within 12-24 month enrol . If number angiography 2 time . Patients receive examination coronary intervention center include . STUDY DURATION It take 12 month collect data 2,400 case 20 CHD intervention center China follow 9 month compete QCA risk factor analysis STUDY PROCESS The statistical analysis include material case . We describe basic history characteristic patient , test parameter image characteristic coronary angiography . Continuous variable describe number , mean , standard deviation ( SD ) , median , minimum value maximum value . Numeric variable normal distribution describe mean SD . Continuous variable compare student test ( normal distribution ) Wilcoxon rank sum test ( skew distribution ) . Categorical variable ( nominal variables/rank variable ) describe frequency percentage , compare Chi square test Fisher exact test . Logistic multiple regression use evaluate risk factor coronary disease progression Chinese patient , among possible risk factor selection base clinical statistical decision . Receiver operate characteristic ( ROC ) curve use establish risk evaluation model coronary disease progression evaluate value . The incomplete data analyze . Data analysis process SPSS 13.0 . All analysis use 2-side test 2-side 95 % confidence interval . There statistical significance 2-side P value less 0.05 . This study use descriptive analysis finally report primary secondary outcome graphic .
